meanings.definition: Cartilage or tough, elastic tissue found in joints
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the gristles in my knee help with movement.
meanings.sent2: When I eat chicken wings, I always avoid the gristles as they are chewy.
meanings.sent3: The gristles in the joints were having a dance party, causing some funky moves.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the gristles in a joint, providing strength and flexibility.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gristles in the joint stuck in my mind like a spring.

meanings.sent1: The steak had some tough gristles that were hard to chew.
meanings.sent2: I always trim off the gristles from the meat before cooking.
meanings.sent3: The gristles in the meat were playing hide and seek with the fork.
meanings.sent4: The gristles in the meat were like tiny ropes holding it together.
meanings.sent5: The gristles in the meat felt like rubber bands, stretching and bouncing.
